thread.title: Wayne Rooney releases statement over Manchester United future
thread.title_full: Wayne Rooney releases statement over Manchester United future

title: Wayne Rooney releases statement over Manchester United future
text:
Wayne Rooney releases statement over Manchester United future WAYNE ROONEY has confirmed he will be staying at Manchester United. PUBLISHED: 17:28, Thu, Feb 23, 2017 | UPDATED: 17:33, Thu, Feb 23, 2017 GETTY Wayne Rooney will be staying at Manchester United this season 
Rooney said: “Despite the interest which has been shown from other clubs, for which I’m grateful, I want to end recent speculation and say that I am staying at Man United. 
“I hope I'll play a full part in helping the team in its fight for success on four fronts. 
“It’s an exciting time at the club and I want to remain a part of it.” 
MORE TO FOLLOW.
